column1: Laura Grubb was a Hobbit of the Shire.
Laura was a sister of Lavender Grubb. She married Mungo Baggins and had five children; the eldest was Bilbo Baggins father Bungo Baggins.
From  to  Laura Grubb was the official matriarch of the Baggins Family.
wikipedia:Laura (given name) is the female form of Latin laurus "bay
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in Bag End. One of them is Laura
column2: and one of Bilbos lines when looking at the portraits is "Thats my Gammer Laura. She was a Grubb before she married a Baggins".
